title: 572B.19 AWARD.
text:
(a) An arbitrator shall make a record of an award. The record must be authenticated by any arbitrator who concurs with the award. The arbitrator or the arbitration organization shall give notice of the award, including a copy of the award, to each party to the arbitration proceeding.
(b) An award must be made within the time specified by the agreement to arbitrate or, if not specified therein, within the time ordered by the court. The court may extend or the parties to the arbitration proceeding may agree in a record to extend the time. The court or the parties may do so within or after the time specified or ordered. A party waives any objection that an award was not timely made unless the party gives notice of the objection to the arbitrator before receiving notice of the award.

variables.name: award_recorded
variables.description: Indicates if the arbitrator has made a record of the award.

variables.name: award_authenticated
variables.description: Indicates if the award record is authenticated by any arbitrator who concurs with the award.

variables.name: award_notice_given
variables.description: Indicates if notice of the award, including a copy of the award, has been given to each party to the arbitration proceeding.

consequences: The award process is compliant with the arbitration requirements.

variables.name: time_specified_in_agreement
variables.description: Indicates if the award was made within the time specified by the agreement to arbitrate.

variables.name: time_ordered_by_court
variables.description: Indicates if the award was made within the time ordered by the court.

variables.name: time_extended_by_court
variables.description: Indicates if the time for making the award was extended by the court.

variables.name: time_extended_by_parties
variables.description: Indicates if the time for making the award was extended by agreement of the parties.

variables.name: objection_waived
variables.description: Indicates if a party has waived any objection to the timeliness of the award.

variables.name: objection_given
variables.description: Indicates if a party has given notice of objection to the timeliness of the award.

variables.name: award_notice_received
variables.description: Indicates if the party has received notice of the award.

consequences: The award is considered timely and valid.
